alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 6:34PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Flagler, St. Johns, northeastern Marion, Putnam and southern Clay Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 634 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Picolata, or 8 miles south of Green Cove Springs, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Interlachen, Keystone Heights, Pomona Park, Hastings, East Palatka, World Golf Village, Marineland, Lake Delancy and Florahome. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
